parameters: Olympia thrusts her head back and hits Kira in the chin. The opportunistic Tickle Lord knows better than to miss a chance like this. Kira reels back, and then she begins tickling Olympia even harder with her nails and shadows.
I’ll get you later, humans! I shan’t allow myself to be distracted...
You and Cissy wiggle your fingers over the long, grey, nylon-clad foot in eager anticipation — four expert hands, twenty practised fingers surrounding a lone exposed foot. How to approach this?

Although Kira’s nyloned foot is not really restrained aside from the portal sprouting it from the ground, there are some benefits to this. Without stocks or toe ties or other bondage getting in the way, it’s actually very easy for you and Cissy to position yourselves to tickle the foot from four different directions at once! You murmur instructions to her and then move into place, spidering and wiggling all your fingers all over sole, instep, inner side, and other side, all at once!

Kira tries to escape, wiggling and jerking her foot here and there, but she’s boxed in and tickled from four directions at once, so every attempt at fleeing only leads that poor feet deeper into another scribbling hand.

Kira’s foot is pretty energetic, and as much as you love watching a pale, shapely, black nylon-clad foot squirm, there is a time when you want a bit of delicious precision. It takes a while for you to get a grip on her toes due to how slick the stockings make them and how strong her feet are, but once you’ve got them, you’ve got them.

You pull the toes back to heighten the grey arch, using two hands to be extra secure, and Cissy’s sharp fingernails dig dip into the arch. Kira wails at once, the entire foot shaking as Cissy uses both hands to zig and zag across the entire foot. When Cissy changes targets and starts digging under and between the nylon toes, you and see the shadows tickling Olympia falter for a moment as the sensation hits.
Yehehes! Tickle her good, humans! You’ve gohohot heheher!
Grahahaha! Let gohoho! Thahaht’s not yours! Hahahahah!
Curious about what the Tickle Lord’s feet taste like, sis?
Not especially, but I’m sure you are. Go and do your thing, bro.
What are you two muttering about...
Kira soon gets her answer, jolting and twitching as your tongue makes contact with her big toe.
Guh! Disgusting humans! Are you savages trying to eat me?

The Tickle Lord huffs and grunts as you take your tongue and slowly slide it across her nylon sole. You’re not sure what you were expecting about taste and texture, you’re pleased to report her soles are nice and soft, with a strong, earthy scent to them. Perhaps it’s due to the dampening effect of the nylon stockings, her own stubbornness, or just a lack of sensitivity to lickling, but her reactions are on the mild side aside from the occasional groan — no laughter. Cissy observes this too and knows to dive in for a bit of ancillary support.

While your tongue and mouth patiently explore her black-painted toes, Cissy’s long nails explore the other side of the foot, tickling the heel with pinches and pokes and strokes. When you go down to lick and nibble around her arch and heel, Cissy goes up to play with the toes by stroking under them, dividing quivering pairs and poking between them. With the two of you working in unison, you soon have the haughty Tickle Lord winded with laughter.
Ahahahaha! Stohohohop! OIympia, cahahahall your humans ohohohoff!

Kira’s thin nylons are soon threadbare from the constant scratching on her foot, especially around that high arch and the along the stems of black-painted toes where you’ve given Kira plenty of lavishing attention. You can feel Kira shivering as you finish the destruction of her stockings so her very ticklish foot is now bare. And when you and your sister unleash the full sum of all the knowledge you’ve gained about her sensitive foot, using fingers, tongue, and guile, Kira shrieks with ferocious laughter, and her grip on Olympia falters.
Wahahahaha! Tohohoo much! Hohow can mere humans be so good at tickling?

Olympia twists around and unloads a blast of light right in Kira’s face. The shadows evaporate, and the Tickle Lord crumples to the floor, still laughing as Cissy’s fingers still snake between her toes.
Prepare yourself, Kira. You’ve racked up quite the debt, and you need to pay, now.

Portals fly out, and for a moment, you think Olympia, in a fit of wrath, has cut her rival to pieces and murdered her! But when the intense light of the portals fade, you’re relieved to see this isn’t the case. The portals have merely ‘divided’ the witchy Tickle Lord into several tickle-sized chunks. There are the neck and the head, the torso up to the hip, the thighs and groin, and of course, the feet -- four lovely spots to choose from.
She’s just using you, fools, just like she uses everyone.
Would you like first plunder, you two? This is your victory as much as mine.

Olympia wiggles her fingers, and you see tiny portals appear on the pads of each brown finger. Feathers sprout from the portals on her left hand, while what look like tiny toothbrushes appear from the portals on her right hand.
But please do choose quickly. I’m most eager.
With Olympia's portals dividing Kira's body into several sections, which one do you want to go for first?

You come over and straddle Kira’s chest area, chuckling at the scowl you see on the Tickle Lord’s face. You dig your nails into both of her collarbones. It’s really quite amusing how the Tickle Lord never lets a smile linger on her face for long. She scours it moments after it appears, replacing it with a pained expression. Once her face settles into a look of ticklish mirth and doesn’t change, that’s when you know she’s well and truly beaten. You do what you can do to speed along that process with some teasing taunting.

Awwww, come on, show us that cute little smile! I want to see it again! Not that evil smile with the sharp teeth, but that adorable little shy one! Yes, there! You did it! Ah, I see you like it when I’m tickling the nape of your neck? Right here? No, right there! Yeah, there we go! Someone loves being tickled there, huh?
Sh-sh-sh-shut up! Lihihihies! Stop the lihihihies, hahahahahah!
Olympia speaks up over by Kira’s groin, where she’s using one brushy finger to swirl all around the entrance to her womanhood.
Is that so? I can see some wetness, you hypocrite. You adore this...
Well, let’s see what Tickle Lord Kira is hiding under her dark robes up here...

You move in front of Kira’s torso, where you feel almost spoiled for choice. You love feet and foot tickling very much, but you have to acknowledge that there is a much greater range of spots when it comes to the torso — the portals have cut off around the biceps, so the armpits are available, as well as trim ribs, thin sides, a decent-sizes bosom, and a slim grey tummy.
Human, you don’t have to dohoho this! Plehehease! Attack Olympia and freehehehee me! I’ll give you anythihihihing you want!
Olympia speaks up over by Kira’s ankles, where she is punishing the grey feet by using her feather-fingers on one foot and her brush-fingers on the other.
Don’t bargain with a shadow, human. The deals you’ve made will melt away once the light of tomorrow comes.
Don’t worry about it. There’s only one thing I want, Kira, and that’s to tickle you and tick you off my list.

As Kira’s face tightens into a snarl, you plunge your fingers into her ribs, which forces a sharp, shuddering scream through the Tickle Lord’s tightly gritted teeth. You can feel Kira’s body shaking and quivering on the grass as she fights to escape, but the portals have her bound tighter than any ropes or chains could achieve, and she’s utterly helpless, unable to stop you exploring her the curves and ridges of her ribcage as you please. Things only get worse when Cissy joins in at your side, using her nails to scribble the armpits. Together, the two of you cover her torso excellently, probing and hitting every spot as you search out her worst spots.
Getting some pretty good reactions on her tummy, bro.
Really? I couldn’t get much what I explored there compared to her ribs.
Gotta use your nails more — she goes ballistic when I skitter them around her belly button, see?
Ah, is that the case, Kira? You like my sister’s long nails and not mine?
Why would we? We take the task of tickling you very seriously.

You eye Kira’s groin, which is now fully exposed. Her privates are as pale as the rest of her, though they seem to be starting to redden under Olympia’s steady touch. The blonde Tickle Lord is using her feather-fingers like a duster, stroking the very sensitive triangle just above the opening which you can see is starting to glisten.
I’ve got this area covered, human. Unless you’d like to work with me?
You twohohoho are both the sahahame! Perverse! Dehehepraved!
I shall provide another descriptor: excellent ticklers.

While Olympia’s slick, smooth feathers brush around Kira’s butt and womanhood, leading to many a mixed moan, grimacing moue, or shuddering sigh, you go for the inner thighs. Little pinches work well, and grazing strokes work even better as together you tease the restrained and helpless Tickle Lord till her hips start thrusting upwards
Awww, is there something you want? Maybe if you beg me, beg us, I’ll consider it.
Olympia just uses one finger to circle Kira’s slit, tantalisingly near to the slick petals, while you stroke gently with your fingers at the joint of thigh and waist.
Is that so? Maybe you need more time to mull it over. I understand.

One feather slips inside Kira’s womanhood and turns about slightly, ever so slightly. It’s enough to get the Tickle Lord groaning, but any pleasure she might derive from it is counterweighted by intense squeezing around the kneecaps done by you.
I didn’t even need you to tell you to do that, human. I must confess, I like working with dependable, independent sorts like yourself.
Cissy, who is digging her nails into Kira’s navel, looks over. She gives you the sad eyes.
Hey, but we’re still the dream team, aren’t we, bro?

You’ve tormented Kira’s foot for a while now, but not both at once. The foot you tickled earlier, the left one, is still bare from when you left it, with the stockings torn to shreds from your eager fingers, but the right one is clad in black nylons. It’s quite an interesting contrast with the dark stockings and her very pale skin, and although it pricks your OCD, you know it’s best to keep them asymmetrical — one bare foot and one stockinged foot means she would receive completely different sensations from each, so it would tickle an awful lot more! Meanwhile, Cissy is skittering her nails into the armpits and Olympia is by Kira’s head, teasing her collarbones and taunting her fellow Tickle Lord.
Look at me, weakling. I want to see the despair in your eyes. You're all mine, now... laugh for me, give me all your power!
Gruhuhuh, shuhuhut up! Shut up, shut up, hahahahahaha!

You decide to helpfully help Kira take her mind off the words by stroking your fingers across both soles at once. You start by doing things symmetrically so she can really feel the difference in nails raking across bare feet versus nylon-clad ones, but then you mix it up further in terms of location, velocity, and technique to keep her guessing, like one hand zipping and zigzagging across a silky nyloned arch, while the other slowly worms through her bare black-painted toes.
Dahahahamnation! Leave my feehehheet alone! You’ve tickled them ehehhenough!
As Kira’s laughter takes on a winded, ragged quality, and her face starts to grow a deep beetroot, Olympia gestures you all to stop.
I think it’s time we give her a little rest. Wouldn’t want her to pass out.
Alright, I’ll stick to English… how are you, my friend! I trust you enjoyed the latest gaming sensation?
Yeah, it wasn’t too bad. A real blueballing at the end though. Was it basically a sequel to the game we played before?

Perhaps, perhaps! Anyway, let us hope a sequel is made! You never know with mercurial game producers… anyway, I thank you all for another journey into a fantastical tickle land! To all my noble and benevolent patrons, I again am deeply grateful for your understanding, patience, and tireless support in making these games become a reality. Cheers to all of you!
Don't forget to check oneortheother's deviantart page for updates!

This stall has a green-clad ninja upon a platform, with her restrained body on the level of your chest as she's tied down. Her head thrashes from side to side as she lets out screams that are muffled from a stone gag in her mouth. You can see why as two inky quills float before her feet. Two pots of ink are nearby, and the quills are dipping into them before coming back to her feet and then stroking all over them. Every inch of her feet are covered with the ink as you approach.
I think this one is gonna appeal to me with my OCD tendencies.

Just below the feet are two buckets of soapy water and toothbrushes, and you barely even have to look at the nearby sign in order to realise what you have to do. Clean those feet of every spot of ink and you win. A small hourglass is nearby, alerting you to the fact that this will be timed as well. A quick glance at the scoreboard informs you of the time to beat.
Absolutely. Well, personal hygiene is very important, especially these days.

You sit down and the quills pull from away from the ninja's feet. She manages to catch your words and lets out a high-pitched whimper. It looks as if the brushes have already put her through a lot as tear stains can be seen on her face. Her feet are dripping with ink, but you can still make out some of the lines and wrinkles of her soles, as well as see how long and slender they are, with toes that droop from how tired they are.

Her digits are splashed all over with ink, and even the tops of her feet have a few splotches. Her toenails get this as well, covered with the ink and hiding the shade of green that the ninja had originally painted them with. You pick up the brushes, and dunk them into the water as Cissy does the same. The hourglass turns over and the sand begins to fall, and both of you start scrubbing away at the ink.

The ninja girl reacts violently to the tickling of the brushes. She twists and strains even as the stone shackles bite into her joint and screams into the gag as the bristles scrape over her soles. If it weren't obvious before that she's deathly sensitive on her feet, it is now. Every movement of the brushes provokes another scream as you clean and tickle her feet at the same time.
Starting to be grateful she’s gagged. She’s a screechy one, isn’t she?
Yeah, though I guess that’s hardly her fault. Sorry, cutie, just gotta beat the high score. Stop screaming at us! You know if we can’t do it, we’ll have to do it again, right?
You nod and ponder your next move.

The ninja girl winces and whimpers as the scrubbing over the arches manages to clear most of the ink. The soft flesh of her milky soles is beginning to turn a shade of pink from the incessant stroking of the toothbrushes. You continue cleaning and give the odd glance towards the hourglass. You’re not sure, but it seems like the sand is falling faster than it should have been.

You and Cissy put all into your efforts of cleaning the arches and the centres of the soles, where most of the ink is. The brushes in your hands are a blur as they move across the arches, heels and balls to get at the odd splotch of ink there. The green-clad ninja would have been wailing like a banshee, had she been able to. But, even with the gag, her maddened laughter is clear. With the high-pitches she’s able to hit, you imagine she’d make a great popstar with such a vocal range.

The stiff bristles of the brush are thin enough to get between the ninja's long toes, allowing you to clean every spot there as well. Doing so earns you the most frantic screams and laughter from the ninja, but you manage to clean away the last of the ink from her toes after a bit of spirited scrubbing.
There, now we can admire those pretty green toes of yours? Isn’t that nice?
Unfortunately, the ninja girl does not seem to think so, from the way she's glowering. If looks could kill, you'd be dead a dozen times by now.
Ah, cramp! Gotta rest my hand...

You shake your hands and try using your non-dominant hand to scrub instead, but it’s really not as effective. You have a fresh admiration for the lers in tickling videos who have to keep up this motion for minutes at a time. It’s surprisingly taxing!

With a final few brushes here and there (Cissy’s meticulous eyes for detail proving especially useful here), you get the victory and the sight of some very clean and pretty feet to go along with it. Surprisingly, despite the fact that you and Cissy both had to rest your sore arms every now and then, you’ve managed to win this one with ease. It’s not till you see the scoreboard that you realise why:
I think we weren’t supposed to do this one at the same time. It’s meant to be a one-player game, right?
That wasn’t in the rules, was it? And since we’re on the scoreboard, I guess it’s alright.
True. I guess the Tickle Lords never thought about that. Yeah, maybe they thought the only people who’d play this would be them or maybe some of the other Tickle Lords.

The ninja can only make a strained noise in response to that. She seems to be at her wit's end from all the tickling she's been put through and in dire need of rescuing, which is an option that isn't open to you right now. You stand up and see the quills come back to life and dip into the ink pots once more. As you walk away, the brushes begin their painting of the ninja's feet, and her torment begins all over again, like Sisyphus’s ordeal.
I think we need some persuading. Isn’t that right, sis?
Definitely. But we might change our mind after some wacky tickles.
Tickle gluttons, are you? I won’t turn down the free mirth energy if that’s your wish.

Chuckling, the Tickle Lord waves her hand, and portals swallow you and Cissy up. A nauseating wave of disorientation later, you find yourselves on the wall of Olympia’s room beside her trophies, and the sight before you is equal parts confusing, enticing, uncanny, and a little disturbing too, since at first glance you look like an extreme amputee.
Someone’s been having fun with her portals, huh?
Naturally. If you possessed my power, you wouldn’t want to make things so mundane, either, would you?
I guess that’s a good point.

And your situation is anything but mundane. A yellow portal has swallowed up your lower body from the waist down, and although your hands are immobile (restrained by smaller portals), you can see more portals transporting sensitive locations for your easy access. By your right hand is a thin, long foot with silver toenails that doesn’t seem to belong to your sister nor the tanned Tickle Lord, while by your left hand is a pudgy white foot that you recognise at once as Cissy’s. In front of your armpits are also two more hands, one which is clearly Cissy’s, while the other has an ornate sleeve and long white fingers that don’t seem to belong to Olympia.
I feel like I could use a diagram to work out whose bits are where...

You look around and see body parts are all over the places for the others too, with the exception of Olympia, who is sitting full and whole on the grass, with a whole selection of choice body parts to target. You notice your genitals there, as well as Cissy’s other foot, and other jumbled body parts you can’t quite identify just yet.
Don’t worry, it’ll make sense once we’ve begun. Just tickle what’s in front of you, laugh when you’re being tickled in turn, and enjoy the pandemonium.
Sounds good to me. But one quick thing — who’s the blonde girl in the silver armour?
You point with your head to the mage below you, which you realise probably is the owner of the foot with silver toenails near your hand, and who also has her portaled hand right by your armpit.

Ah, that mage is my secret hoard in case things grow dire with Kira. She’s a light mage. And she could absolutely scorch Kira to pieces with her spark magic. She also makes a lot of light-based puns, which is why I had to gag her.
By the way, just want to say a quick thanks for giving me feet, like putting them in portals by my hands. They’re my favourite spot to tease.
Is that so? I noticed you looking at mine with that hungry expression...

It’s true — Olympia’s gladiator sandals caught your eyes right from the beginning. Her toned, athletic brown legs and her yellow toenails are delightfully ostentatious too, particularly with the golden toe rings on each middle toe.
So perhaps as a token of good will, I’ll let you have a taste... but make sure you behave yourself, yes?
Olympia chuckles and waves her hand, and moments later, a portal appears around her left foot. The foot appears right in front of your face, bare and wiggling playfully.

Alright, without further ado, let’s begin this little tickle fight, shall we? Laugh richly and deep, and earn me plentiful mirth energy! I know most Tickle Lords prefer to do all the tickling themselves, but honestly, that’s such inefficient use of resources. Having everyone tickling each other is just so much more profitable.

You look at the foot that Olympia has so kindly put right in front of your mouth, grinning. You give it a few slow licks up the sole and you can feel the Tickle Lord tensing and shivering in response to the sensations. Her toes curl, and her sole becomes imbued with wrinkles, and you explore those soft ridges of flesh with your tongue, slowly tracing each wrinkle and line of the scrunched sole with your tongue.
Thahahahaanks, I do tend to gehehehet rave reviews from my lehehehees.
You dohoho? Thahahat’s not what they told mehehee!

Ignoring Cissy’s foul slander, you focus on Olympia’s toes, those brown, bubble-like digits are an exotic sight, especially with the yellow toenail polish and golden toe rings. You so rarely see such a flashy and flamboyant combination, and you show your appreciation with your tender suckles and skilful licks while the Tickle Lord coos in delight.
Ahhhhh, you’re pretty skilful, human. Hehehehe, masterful, human... I was right to give you a chance.

You’ve always been good doing all sorts of things with one hand, and tickling is no exception! The lack of bondage means to you need to spend a fair bit of time chasing Cissy’s pudgy feet to and fro, but you know your sister’s ticklish feet so well that you can say with certainty that you’re landing significant tickles each time — a few quick scribbles around the centres of the sole here, a few strokes under the toes there. Cissy’s pink soles have lighter patches of blazing white, and you know those are the best spots to target.
Ahahaha! I can gihihive as good as I geheheht, brohoho!

You can feel your sister’s nails acutely in your armpit. You know better than to expect mercy from Cissy, who rarely turns down an opportunity to tickle you (though to be fair the feeling is very mutual), but the mage is giving it to you just as much, though presumably that’s in retaliation for how more you’re tickling her foot.

The light mage’s lovely thin feet remind you a little of a turtle, though you know in your mind that this analogy is bizarre. Her silver toes are all curled up, so her foot resembles a ball as you land tickle after tickle on the foot, which doesn’t move at all, instead staying still and enduring the tickles. Elsewhere, you can see Cissy’s feet twitching and spasming all over the place, but this mage really is different — as if she were standing in a shield wall, she just stays where she is and relies on her barrier to protect her.
Cohohohome ohohon, open up for me, ahahaha!

And the mage shakes her head in wilful defiance! You’d very much like to search the stems of her milky toes for hot spots, try the undersides, test the toe-webbing, or experiment with the pads, but despite your scribbles on her arch, teasing strokes on the tops, or trying to force her toes open (which doesn’t really work when you’ve only got one hand to spare), she proves implacable and stubborn. You take out your frustration on her heavily wrinkled arch, but she remains unyielding as ever. You don’t know much about the mage aside from the fact she looks vaguely familiar and knows light magic apparently, but you have a feeling you definitely wouldn’t want something so persistent for a foe.

If you were in Tickle Lord Olympia's position right now, you know you would be absolutely over the moon with such a variety of delicious spots to tuck into, but Olympia’s reactions are surprisingly reserved, she keeps that ever-present little smirk as she cycles through a variety of areas to tickle with her tanned, nimble fingers. She spends plenty of time on Cissy’s stomach and the light mage’s breasts, yet for some reason, you sure feel like she gets a special joy out of tormenting your member. With all the tickling going on, your arousal is pointing to the clouds, so it’s easier for her nails to explore all over your genitals, especially with the portal keeping everything in place. Every now and then, she even tickles you with both hands, devoting full attention to your helpless privates.
I would... but you’re just so ticklish here. One little touch, and you fall to pieces. It's remarkable.

She watches you as she takes her nails and wiggles them speedily under your balls. You flop your head back and squeal with high-pitched laughter, that laughter morphing into rapid-fire guffaws when her nails start scratching up and down your shift, before going back into high squeaks once again once your head and tip is targeted.

Cissy has the light mage’s bare stomach in front of her face, and she’s treating it to plenty of raspberries, as well as teasing licks with her tongue. Her hands are both busy too, with one hand drilling into your armpit while her other hand seems to be squeezing a pale knee cap (the light mage’s, probably). You’re quite impressed with how she can do three things at once, since rubbing your stomach and patting your head is something you struggle with yourself.

The light mage is a bundle of bouncy energy, and you can see her straining as hands reach out of portals to tickle her in numerous spots at once. Her laughter is light and melodious too, with a youthful, schoolgirlish quality to her giggles that you find lovely to listen to.
Having fun, lihihihight mage? You’re tihihickling me prethehheetty well, hahaha!
Yeah, she caught on quick, that one. I mean, she’d probably like to blast me with her light magic if she could, but she’s content to be my little guest for now.
So, you two had enough? Ready to progress?
Watch the Cissy, Brandon, and Matilda tickled by Brock scene?

When your head stops spinning, you find yourself in a most curious predicament indeed. Burly angel and snarling demon statues have you three pinned down — you, Cissy, and Tickle Lord Matilda. There are no stocks or bondage here aside from their stone hands, but perhaps with their weight and implacable grip, that’s enough, as they push down your ankles and wrists. Brock tsks over the three of you, shaking his head.
Uh, greetings, Brocks! It seems you have me in a rather exposed situation. Care to explain what’s the meaning of this? I know I’ve misinterpreted signals in the past...
He sighs and speaks in a low gravelly voice.
You’re here to proclaim your love? Return her affections?
You’re here to ravish her? Seduce and tickle her?
Hmmm, those sound pretty good to me...
No, and don’t encourage her wild fantasies.
Ah, but what is this world if not a wild fantasy?
A dull dark one where jobs need to be done, quotas need to be reached, and responsibilities need to be accepted. I take no particular pleasure in this, Matilda, but I think you need a firm lesson.

No pleasure at all? Not even a little? Come on, don't you wanna tickle me good, get me all giggly, and have me fall into your arms? Come on, Brock! I've seen the way you look at me sometimes! Seen the way you look at my feet when you think I'm not looking...
So much lust... so very much.

His eyes follow yours and linger on Matilda’s bare feet. It seems you’re about to be tickled, but at least you finally get a proper look at Matilda’s bare feet, though your position of being restrained beside her means you don’t get much of a view of her soles, just the tops and toes. Maybe it’s the angle, but her feet seem very small and petite, with chipped toenail polish done a cheerful red. The painted digits wiggle about with a nervous energy. Juxtaposed besides Cissy’s similarly small pair, you observe the Tickle Lord’s feet are a little smaller, but thinner instead of chubby. They also have that same pale orange skin tone that indicated Matilda is not quite human, though the wings and ears are also giveaways. Tickle Lord Brock stops for a moment, blinks, and then shakes his head.

Put all that lust to good use, my statues. Tickle it all out of them. Brushes and fingers, standard technique, five-minute cycles. And keep them orgasming. I want them all weary of such talk upon my return. Milk them dry.
Afraid I have other matters to attend to. I shall return in several hours. I hope by then, you’ve come to your senses, Matilda, and are ready to resume your duties.

He walks away, and you can’t help but feel disrespected. What, he doesn’t he even bother to torment you himself? You then realise this is a really rather strange thing to think and banish the thought. Better to focus on how you can escape! The statues have the three of you firmly pinned, and the angels are reaching for brushes. Some have worn and battered toothbrushes, some have large bristly scrub brushes, and a few even have ivory-handled hairbrushes. You can see where this is going...
Ugh, where did you guys even get those things?
We found them in the ruins. A little poor condition, but very useful tickling tools, especially since the other Tickle Lords didn’t want to share their supplies with us. Cheap bastards.

One of the angel statues reaches your genitals and starts tugging your member, while her other hand tickles your balls. Similar things are happening to the others too, though you find it a little hard to concentrate amidst your own ticklish pandemonium once the brushes start scrubbing your feet and stone fingers start digging into your armpits.
I cahahan’t! Brock confiscated by rihihing of power, hahahaha!
Grahahaha, come ohohohon! Whahahat can we dohohoho?
